name: Espresso
description: Kaw kaw (thick thick) black coffee, one shot is enough to stay focused for whole day

name: Americano
description: A diluted espresso with hot water, offering a lighter coffee taste.

name: Latte
description: A creamy coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Green Tea
description: Refreshing herbal tea, suitable for people who is on diet

name: English Breakfast Tea
description: A robust black tea blend, perfect for starting your day.

name: Matcha
description: A vibrant green tea powder whisked with hot water, known for its earthy flavor.

name: Croissant
description: Buttery pastry with a flaky crust and a golden center, yum!

name: Curry Puff
description: A savory pastry filled with spiced curry filling.

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: A sweet roll with cinnamon filling, topped with icing.
